body.raw:
{
    "stories": [
        {
            "title": "User Login Feature",
            "user_role": "Customer",
            "goal": "log into the system using email and password",
            "benefit": "access my personalized dashboard and saved preferences",
            "acceptance_criteria": [
                "System validates email format",
                "System checks password against stored hash",
                "Valid credentials redirect to dashboard",
                "Invalid credentials show appropriate error message",
                "Forgot password link is available"
            ],
            "priority": "Must Have",
            "document": "Authentication Module"
        },
        {
            "title": "Password Reset Feature",
            "user_role": "Registered User",
            "goal": "reset my forgotten password",
            "benefit": "regain access to my account securely",
            "acceptance_criteria": [
                "User can request password reset via email",
                "Reset link expires after 24 hours",
                "New password must meet security requirements",
                "User receives confirmation email after reset"
            ],
            "priority": "Should Have",
            "document": "Authentication Module"
        }
    ]
}

formdata.description: Upload multiple files (PDF, DOCX, Excel, Images)
Comma-separated list of document types to generate
